模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Database

类 DataManager

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Database.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
The DataManager handles operations related with game data:

(1) updating level,score, lives in the world (2) check the finish condition of the game (3) store the hero appearance

另请参阅:
InteractableWorld
